title: Vamos a Sayulita | Spanish Comprehensible Input

media:group.media:title: Vamos a Sayulita | Spanish Comprehensible Input
media:group.media:description:
Practice your Spanish listening comprehension and speaking while exploring Sayulita, Mexico! Learn vocabulary related to visiting a coastal town while also practicing common descriptions and dialogues using high frequency verbs, such as gustar, ser, estar, and haber.

Through storytelling, as well as "storyasking," you will have moments to practice speaking Spanish and responding to questions in the target language.

TPRS (Teaching Proficiency through Reading and Storytelling) has been proven to be an effective and engaging way to learn a new language. If you enjoy this approach to language acquisition, subscribe to my channel for more TPRS and Comprehensible Input videos to come!
